summary: Provides a wrapper class that loads a torchvision classification model and modifies its final classification head. The wrapper can either replace the last fully‑connected layer or remove the existing pooling and head, inserting a new pooling layer followed by a configurable fully‑connected or convolutional layer, with optional pretrained weights.
business_intent: Enables easy adaptation of pretrained torchvision models for custom classification tasks in the MONAI framework, supporting transfer learning and flexible head customization for medical imaging applications.
